fpmExplorer:Page.title: Input Mask
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Field building block enables you to render masked input fields, which allow users to enter values only in the specified format.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Add a UI.Mask annotation to the property to be masked. The annotation specifies the Mask to be applied to the value, the PlaceholderSymbol shows where the user can enter data.
